    • Constructor Detail

      • Bid

        public Bid()
        Create the default bid (1C).

      • Bid

        public Bid(int rank,
           int strain)
        Create bid from two ints.
        Parameters:
        rank - 1-7 inclusive
        strain - C, D, H, S, or NT

      • Bid

        public Bid(java.lang.String bidStr)
        Creates a bid from a string. The string is accepted if if is of the form rank+strain, parsed by the following rules: - rank is a number from 1-7 (inclusive) - strain is one of C (clubs), D (diamonds), H (hearts), S (spades), and NT or N (notrump). - The string is parsed case-insensitively.
        Parameters:
        bidStr - a string representing the bid to be created
        Throws:
        MalformedCallException - if the passed string doesn't represent a bid

    • Method Detail

      • rank

        public int rank()
        Accessor for the rank of the bid.
        Returns:
        the rank of the bid

      • strain

        public int strain()
        Accessor for the strain of the bid.
        Returns:
        one of Rules.CLUBS, Rules.DAIMONDS, Rules.HEARTS, Rules.SPADES, and Rules.NOTRUMP

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Bid b)
        Find whether one bid is smaller, equal to, or greater than another. A bid is smaller than another one if one of the following is satisfied: - The strain of the former is less than the strain of the latter - The strains are equal and the strain of the former is less than that of the latter Two bids are equal if their strains and ranks are equal. Otherwise, the first bid is larger than the second.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Bid>
        Parameters:
        b - the bid to compare to this one
        Returns:
        < 0 if the first bid is less than the second, 0 if they are equal, > 0 otherwise.
        See Also:
        Comparable.compareTo(T)

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Convert the Bid to a string. If b is a Bid and Bid b1 = new Bid(b.toString()), the two objects should be equivalent.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a string
